Package ca.corefacility.gview.map.gui.editor.communication.labelEvent

Package providing classes for communication of label events.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LabelBackgroundColorEvent
    An action for modifying the label's background color.
    LabelEvent
    A label event.
    LabelFontFamilyEvent
    An action for modifying the label font family.
    LabelFontSizeEvent
    An action for modifying the label font size.
    LabelFontStyleEvent
    An action for modifying the label font style.
    LabelLockColorsEvent
    An action for modifying the label's locked colors state.
    LabelTextColorEvent
    An action for modifying the label's text color.
    LabelTextEvent
    An action for modifying the label text.
    LabelVisibleEvent
    An action for modifying the label visibilty.
